participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Determined and passionate, Emily is someone who thrives on challenges and is dedicated to her goals. She is optimistic and enjoys sharing her love for sports and fitness with others.
participant_1.background: my favorite color is yellow. i love italian food and garlic bread. i am a gold medalist olympian. gymnastics is my favorite sport. i workout four hours a day.

participant_2.name: Frank
participant_2.personality: Frank is introspective and often struggles with feelings of inadequacy. He tends to be sarcastic and uses humor as a defense mechanism, but he is also deeply lonely and yearns for connection.
participant_2.background: i work at a nursing home. i am overweight and unhappy. my wife left me and took my children. i spend most of my time on facebook when i am not working. i don't believe in god.
